text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Autumn's first race arrives, and<n>Mejiro McQueen
comfortably places<n>first in the Kyoto Daishoten.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With each new race she runs, she<n>earns still greater respect
and<n>admiration.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I'm shook! You can't take two steps<n>without seeing
McQueen's face on<n>some magazine or screen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I never expected to draw quite this<n>much attention...

text_block_list.name: Young Boy
text_block_list.text: Wow, it's Major McKeen! Can you<n>shake my hand?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, I'd be happy to. Also, it's<n>"Mejiro McQueen."

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Even the whippersnappers know 'er.<n>Ey, Star
Umamusume?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Really... Can't you stop with the<n>jokes for even a second?

text_block_list.name: Young Boy
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna cheer real loud for you in<n>the next race too. Do
your best, Major<n>McKeen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much. I definitely<n>have to win now! Also,
it's "Mejiro<n>McQueen."

text_block_list.name: Young Boy
text_block_list.text: See you! Bye-bye!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Goodbye now!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I can't say that I am used to these<n>kinds of interactions.
Reputation is a<n>strange thing.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
What's that? Don't tell me you're<n>going to turn into a
jittery mess.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Th-that is definitely not going to<n>happen. As a member of the<n>
prestigious Mejiro family, I always<n>carry myself with
dignity!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah? Well, I don't see why you<n>can't just jitter out
sometimes.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Would you please make up yourmind?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Good morning, everyone.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
McQueen, good news! It looks like<n>there are a ton more
people asking to<n>transfer into our team!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My, the applications haven't stopped<n>since the Kyoto
Daishoten.

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: It's all thanks to your efforts,<n>McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
It would be super amazing if you<n>could also win the autumn
Tenno Sho.<n>Imagine winning both spring and fall!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: The number of new applicants would<n>be through the roof!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Please, you're all speaking like I've<n>already won.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
It's no wonder everyone's so<n>excited. You're showing no
signs of<n>slowing down!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
It's no wonder everyone's so<n>excited. You're showing no
signs of<n>slowing down!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
It's been a while since Team Sirius<n>has had this much
attention. Probably<n>not since the heyday of the last<n>trainer.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Oh, we are so back.

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: You've got my front-row cheers!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you for your enthusiasticsupport, everyone. I will bewinning the next race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: With that being said, let's start<n>today's training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
True to her bold words, McQueen<n>brings an inspiring amount
of energy<n>to the day's training session.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Whoa, look at 'er go!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And that's a finish! A flawless win,<n>and you took the
initiative at the best<n>possible moment!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And that's a finish! A flawless win,<n>and you took the
initiative at the best<n>possible moment!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Well, of course. At the Takarazuka<n>Kinen, I failed to seize a
good position<n>and had to take wide arcs around the<n>turns.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If I want to ensure that races go my<n>way, I need to pay
extra attention to<n>my dash power and positioning.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ho ho ho. Mayhaps you will soon be<n>able to face me, young
one.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Before you worry about racing me,<n>perhaps you should try
passing the<n>basic gate test.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
All right folks, let's wrap it up here for<n>today. Be sure to ice
those legs.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Actually, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm still feeling pretty good, so I'll be<n>taking another lap.

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Oh, then I'm going to go for another<n>one, too.

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Me too! If McQueen can still do it, so<n>can we!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hm? Please don't force yourselves...

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Nah, it's fine! Seeing you run gives us<n>the power!
choice_data_list: All right, just a bit more.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Goodness. Once more, then.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Golly, they make it look easy. GuessI'll spice things up!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hey! Hands off the tail!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro McQueen's industrious<n>attitude has had nothing but
good<n>effects on the team.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She very much is the heart and soul<n>of Team Sirius.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Trainer!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Tazuna! You need me?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
There's something I'd like to discuss<n>with you concerning
McQueen.
